name: Drakon
description: The Drakon is a large dragon with impressive physical capabilities and a unique color variation that permits it to thrive in various environments. Notable for its powerful jaws and long, sweeping tail, it possesses a sleek, agile body that allows for deception and ambush.
memorable: Its ability to incapacitate prey with its Dissolving Gaze makes it a uniquely dangerous dragon, threatening both in close combat and from a distance with its Acid Breath.
goals: Typically acts as a predator, seeking to incapacitate and consume prey.
relations: May be encountered alongside other draconic creatures or serve as a guardian of treasure.
environment: Often found in both aquatic and terrestrial habitats.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity grants it stealth and evasion; resistance to acid damage enhances its durability.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence limits its tactical options and makes it reliant on brute force.
attacks: Utilizes a swift Bite attack combined with an impactful Tail attack, as well as the long-range Acid Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Dissolving Gaze, which paralyzes and harms opponents while reducing their maximum hit points.
skills: Boasts notable bonuses in Stealth and Perception, making it a skilled ambush predator.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its Amphibious trait.
Immunity to the paralyzed condition allows it to use its abilities without fear of being incapacitated.
Allows it to manipulate battlefield presence through stealth and surprise.
Highly effective area damage with Acid Breath for crowd control.
Has a paralyzing effect which can eliminate threats effectively.

formidable monster that can breathe water and air
stealthy creature with paralyzing gaze and acid damage
swift dragon that excels in ambush tactics
dragon known for dissolving gaze and poison resistance
